channel.title: Precalculus on Xiaohui Xie's Site
channel.description: Recent content in Precalculus on Xiaohui Xie's Site

item.title: AMC Scope Map
item.description: Comprehensive matrix showing AMC 10 vs AMC 12 precalculus topic coverage and testing frequency.

item.title: Notation Cheatsheet
item.description: Essential symbols, functions, and mathematical notation for AMC precalculus problems.

item.title: Concept Atlas
item.description: One-paragraph primers on all major precalculus topics with AMC application notes.

item.title: Functions & Transformations
item.description: Domains, ranges, inverses, shifts, scales, and symmetry in functions for AMC preparation.

item.title: Equations & Inequalities
item.description: Absolute value equations, systems, and inequality techniques including AM-GM for AMC preparation.

item.title: Polynomials & Rational Functions
item.description: Factoring, Vieta's formulas, asymptotes, and partial fractions for AMC polynomial problems.

item.title: Exponents & Logarithms
item.description: Laws, change-of-base, equation solving, and growth/decay applications for AMC preparation.

item.title: Trigonometry Basics
item.description: Unit circle, special angles, and right triangle relationships for AMC trigonometry problems.

item.title: Trig Identities & Equations
item.description: Addition formulas, double/half angles, sum-to-product, and inverse trig functions for AMC problems.

item.title: Laws of Sines & Cosines
item.description: Triangle solving, area calculations, and the ambiguous case for AMC geometry problems.

item.title: Complex Numbers
item.description: Algebra, polar form, De Moivre's theorem, and roots of unity for AMC 12 complex number problems.

item.title: Complex Plane Geometry
item.description: Rotations, loci, and geometric applications in the complex plane for AMC 12 problems.

item.title: Sequences & Series
item.description: Arithmetic, geometric, telescoping, and partial sums for AMC sequence problems.

item.title: Binomial Theorem & Series
item.description: Binomial expansions, coefficients, and estimation techniques for AMC problems.

item.title: Coordinate Geometry
item.description: Lines, circles, distance, and basic conic sections for AMC coordinate geometry problems.

item.title: Vectors (Light)
item.description: 2D vectors, dot product, and projections for AMC 12 vector problems.

item.title: Functional Equations (Light)
item.description: Substitutions, invariants, and simple AMC 12 functional equation patterns.

item.title: Solving Trig Equations
item.description: Pattern recognition and solution strategies for trigonometric equations in AMC problems.

item.title: Logarithm Equations & Inequalities
item.description: Pattern recognition and solution strategies for logarithmic equations and inequalities in AMC problems.

item.title: Polynomial Roots & Vieta
item.description: Pattern recognition and solution strategies for polynomial root problems using Vieta's formulas.

item.title: Inequalities AM-GM & Cauchy
item.description: Pattern recognition and solution strategies for inequality problems using AM-GM and Cauchy-Schwarz.

item.title: Complete Formula Bank
item.description: Comprehensive collection of all essential precalculus formulas with usage examples.

item.title: Complete Problem-Solving Guide
item.description: Comprehensive strategies, checklists, and timing advice for AMC precalculus success.
